TIME TO GET IN SHAPE
FOR SUMMER BEACH SEASON!

It's easier than you think — sign up for one of our
fitness classes and grab a 20% discount.
Yoga
Fitness
Bend, stretch and let your body breathe. Perfect for morning wakeup.
Energetic mixture of aerobics, Latin dance and boxing — for smooth moves and a good mood.
Nordic Walking
Gym Workout Sessions
Outdoor sessions with a professional trainer. Breathe some fresh air, meet new people, and get fit!
Our experienced personal trainers help you pick the right exercises to create a perfect workout for your body.

SPRING IS A PERFECT TIME TO START
so you get results you can enjoy this summer!
